overview: Telis, inventor of "Heraclitus computers", presents his new achievement, the robot Paraskeva, which among other fans who do, can read the minds of people. Telis has built Paraskevas replica of himself, and this helps him to fulfill various obligations wants to avoid, such as its involvement in gynaikodouleies partner Costas
title: Μερικές τον Προτιμούν Ηλεκτρονικό
